${modID}:Assessment.NAME: Assessment
${modID}:Assessment.DESCRIPTION: Draw 1 card for each time you have attacked this turn.
${modID}:Assessment.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Draw 1 card. NL Draw 1 additional card for each time you have attacked this turn.

${modID}:BlowAway.NAME: Blow Away
${modID}:BlowAway.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply 1 zephyrsquallmod:Headwind. NL Gain !M! zephyrsquallmod:Tailwind. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:Book.NAME: Book
${modID}:Book.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Return the zephyrsquallmod:Recorded cards to your hand. NL Exhaust.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Return nothing to your hand. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:BookAvalanche.NAME: Book Avalanche
${modID}:BookAvalanche.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Deals additional damage equal to the number of cards in your deck.

${modID}:BreatheDeeply.NAME: Breathe Deeply
${modID}:BreatheDeeply.DESCRIPTION: Next turn, add a *Wind *Blast into your hand.
${modID}:BreatheDeeply.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Next turn, add a *Wind *Blast into your hand and zephyrsquallmod:Streamline it.

${modID}:CalculatedStrike.NAME: Calculated Strike
${modID}:CalculatedStrike.DESCRIPTION: Can only be played if this card costs 0. NL Deal !D! damage.

${modID}:Contemplate.NAME: Contemplate
${modID}:Contemplate.DESCRIPTION: {@@}At the start of your turn, draw !M! additional card{!M!|@=s|1=}.

${modID}:EscapePlan.NAME: Escape Plan
${modID}:EscapePlan.DESCRIPTION: Gain Block equal to half the damage intention of an enemy.
${modID}:EscapePlan.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain Block equal to the damage intention of an enemy.

${modID}:FlashOfInspiration.NAME: Flash of Inspiration
${modID}:FlashOfInspiration.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Unplayable. NL Whenever you draw this card, zephyrsquallmod:Streamline !M! card{!M!|@=s|1=} at random.

${modID}:Focus.NAME: Focus
${modID}:Focus.DESCRIPTION: Discard any number of cards. NL Deal !D! damage for each card discarded this way.

${modID}:GlyphOfWarding.NAME: Glyph of Warding
${modID}:GlyphOfWarding.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL While zephyrsquallmod:Recorded in a Book in your hand, enemy attacks deal !M! less damage.

${modID}:Gust.NAME: Gust
${modID}:Gust.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Deals additional damage equal to zephyrsquallmod:Tailwind gained this combat.

${modID}:Harry.NAME: Harry
${modID}:Harry.DESCRIPTION: If you have attacked 4 or more times this turn, gain !B! Block. NL Deal !D! damage 2 times.

${modID}:KnowledgeIsPower.NAME: Knowledge is Power
${modID}:KnowledgeIsPower.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you try to draw a card while your hand is full, deal !M! damage to a random enemy.

${modID}:KnowledgeShield.NAME: Knowledge Shield
${modID}:KnowledgeShield.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL zephyrsquallmod:Well_Read: Gain !B! Block again.

${modID}:LightReading.NAME: Light Reading
${modID}:LightReading.DESCRIPTION: {@@}zephyrsquallmod:Well_Read bonus effects occur with !M! less card{!M!|@=s|1=} in your hand.

${modID}:Maelstrom.NAME: Maelstrom
${modID}:Maelstrom.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you attack, deal !M! damage to ALL enemies.

${modID}:MagnumOpus.NAME: Magnum Opus
${modID}:MagnumOpus.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies for each time this card has been zephyrsquallmod:Streamlined.

${modID}:MindMap.NAME: Mind Map
${modID}:MindMap.DESCRIPTION: The first time you try to draw a card while your hand is full each turn, play the top card of your draw pile.

${modID}:Nexus.NAME: Nexus
${modID}:Nexus.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Deal !D! damage !M! time{!M!|@=s|1=}. NL Increase the number of times ALL Nexus cards deal damage by 1 this combat.

${modID}:OneWithTheWind.NAME: One With the Wind
${modID}:OneWithTheWind.DESCRIPTION: Block is not removed at the start of zephyrsquallmod:Tailwind extra turns.
${modID}:OneWithTheWind.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Block is not removed at the start of zephyrsquallmod:Tailwind extra turns. NL Gain !M! zephyrsquallmod:Tailwind.

${modID}:PerfectTechnique.NAME: Perfect Technique
${modID}:PerfectTechnique.DESCRIPTION: zephyrsquallmod:Streamline all cards in your draw pile. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:Plagiarize.NAME: Plagiarize
${modID}:Plagiarize.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Choose a Book. Add {!M!|@=!M! copies|1=a copy} of that Book into your hand.

${modID}:PlanB.NAME: Plan B
${modID}:PlanB.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Discard up to 2 cards. NL Draw !M! card{!M!|@=s|1=} for each card discarded this way.
${modID}:PlanB.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: {@@}Discard any number of cards. NL Draw !M! card{!M!|@=s|1=} for each card discarded this way.

${modID}:PlanOfAttack.NAME: Plan of Attack
${modID}:PlanOfAttack.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage 2 times. NL While in hand, your other Attacks deal 1 additional damage.

${modID}:PressureSystem.NAME: Pressure System
${modID}:PressureSystem.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, gain !M! zephyrsquallmod:Tailwind.

${modID}:QuickThinking.NAME: Quick Thinking
${modID}:QuickThinking.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Gain !B! Block. NL Whenever you draw this card, draw !M! additional card{!M!|@=s|1=}.

${modID}:ReadAhead.NAME: Read Ahead
${modID}:ReadAhead.DESCRIPTION: {@@}zephyrsquallmod:Record the top !M! card{!M!|@=s|1=} of your draw pile.

${modID}:Refine.NAME: Refine
${modID}:Refine.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Choose {!M!|@=!M! cards|1=a card}. Upgrade {!M!|@=those cards|1=that card} for the rest of combat and zephyrsquallmod:Streamline {!M!|@=them|1=it}.

${modID}:Riposte.NAME: Riposte
${modID}:Riposte.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you block an attack this turn, deal blocked damage back. NL zephyrsquallmod:Well_Read: Gain !B! Block.

${modID}:SecretPassage.NAME: Secret Passage
${modID}:SecretPassage.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Intangible. NL Draw 5 less cards next turn. NL zephyrsquallmod:Well_Read: zephyrsquallmod:Record up to 2 cards.

${modID}:SeizeAnOpening.NAME: Seize an Opening
${modID}:SeizeAnOpening.DESCRIPTION: {@@}If the enemy does not intend to attack, deal !D! damage !M! time{!M!|@=s|1=}.

${modID}:StormBrewing.NAME: Storm Brewing
${modID}:StormBrewing.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! zephyrsquallmod:Tailwind. NL Permanently increase this card's zephyrsquallmod:Tailwind by 1, to a maximum of 9. NL Exhaust.
${modID}:StormBrewing.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! zephyrsquallmod:Tailwind. NL Permanently increase this card's zephyrsquallmod:Tailwind by 1. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:SwiftStrike.NAME: Swift Strike
${modID}:SwiftStrike.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Deal !D! damage. NL If this card costs 0, draw !M! card{!M!|@=s|1=} and zephyrsquallmod:Streamline !M! card{!M!|@=s|1=}.

${modID}:Tornado.NAME: Tornado
${modID}:Tornado.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies !M! time{!M!|@=s|1=}. NL During zephyrsquallmod:Tailwind extra turns, deals damage !M! additional time{!M!|@=s|1=}.

${modID}:WhipUp.NAME: Whip Up
${modID}:WhipUp.DESCRIPTION: Cannot be played during zephyrsquallmod:Tailwind extra turns. NL Gain !M! zephyrsquallmod:Tailwind.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: It is a Tailwind extra turn!

${modID}:WindBlast.NAME: Wind Blast
${modID}:WindBlast.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Exhaust.
